title: Unstable subnet topic peers
body: **Describe the bug** Subnet topic peers are unstable, I see different patterns on different nodes In worse case, user reported missed attestation due to no subnet peers ``` beacon_node_1 | Apr-24 04:03:24.868[api] error: Error on submitPoolAttestations [0] slot=6290415, index=2 PublishError.InsufficientPeers beacon_node_1 | Error: PublishError.InsufficientPeers beacon_node_1 | at Eth2Gossipsub.publish (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/libp2p-gossipsub/src/index.ts:2038:13) beacon_node_1 | at Eth2Gossipsub.publishObject (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/network/gossip/gossipsub.ts:176:20) beacon_node_1 | at file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/api/impl/beacon/pool/index.ts:69:31 beacon_node_1 | at async Promise.all (index 0) beacon_node_1 | at Object.submitPoolAttestations (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/api/impl/beacon/pool/index.ts:52:7) beacon_node_1 | at Object.handler (file:///usr/app/packages/api/src/utils/server/genericJsonServer.ts:44:23) beacon_node_1 | Apr-24 04:03:24.869[rest] error: Req req-9exg submitPoolAttestations error PublishError.InsufficientPeers beacon_node_1 | Error: PublishError.InsufficientPeers beacon_node_1 | at Eth2Gossipsub.publish (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/libp2p-gossipsub/src/index.ts:2038:13) beacon_node_1 | at Eth2Gossipsub.publishObject (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/network/gossip/gossipsub.ts:176:20) beacon_node_1 | at file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/api/impl/beacon/pool/index.ts:69:31 beacon_node_1 | at async Promise.all (index 0) beacon_node_1 | at Object.submitPoolAttestations (file:///usr/app/packages/beacon-node/src/api/impl/beacon/pool/index.ts:52:7) beacon_node_1 | at Object.handler (file:///usr/app/packages/api/src/utils/server/genericJsonServer.ts:44:23) ``` more context https://discord.com/channels/593655374469660673/593655641445367808/1099907367442845786 **Expected behavior** - Stable good number of subnet peers
